lead_paragraph: Patricia Miranda, a bronze medalist in 2004 in Athens and the first woman to win an Olympic wrestling medal, failed to qualify for the United States Olympic team, losing to Clarissa Chun at the wrestling trials in Las Vegas.
snippet: Patricia Miranda, a bronze medalist in 2004 in Athens and the first woman to win an Olympic wrestling medal, failed to qualify for the United States Olympic team, losing to Clarissa Chun at the wrestling trials in Las Vegas.
